definition: tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: Oil content and accumulation of Acer truncatum samara were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對元寶楓翅果油脂含量和累積規律進行了研究。

sentences.english: Cumulate probability distribution of trials of random variable of uniform distribution.
sentences.chinese: 隨機變數多次試驗結果之累積機率爲均勻分佈。

sentences.english: The 38th minute, the Banay Canada accumulates two yellow cards to punish.
sentences.chinese: 第38分鐘，巴內加累積兩張黃牌被罰下。

sentences.english: Those who have enrolled in credit-bearing courses offered under CAM will be issued a CAM student identity card.
sentences.chinese: 學分累積制的學員將獲發學生證作辨別身份之用。

sentences.english: As fat accumulates within the body, weight increases.
sentences.chinese: 隨着脂肪的累積，體重也在不斷增加。

sentences.english: Case studies are an integral part of knowledge cumulation .
sentences.chinese: 案例研究是知識累積的主要部分。

sentences.english: This means that tunnel parameters can accumulate from several levels of the template-invocation stack.
sentences.chinese: 這就是說通道參數可以在多層模板調用棧中累積。

sentences.english: Let us be determined not to collect grievances today.
sentences.chinese: 今天讓我們下定決心，不再去累積任何怨尤。

sentences.english: The dissolution tests were carried out with basket-stirring method, and the accumulative release percentage was calculated.
sentences.chinese: 採用轉籃法測定溶出度，並計算累積溶出百分率。

sentences.english: Art is all about the slow accumulation over time.
sentences.chinese: 藝術不過是隨着時間的慢慢累積。

sentences.english: We expect there will be lots of people going to buy tickets due to the snowballing jackpot.
sentences.chinese: 由於累積獎金豐厚，預期會有很多買今期的六合彩。

sentences.english: Moreover, the effects of immigration are cumulative.
sentences.chinese: 此外，移民會產生累積性影響。

sentences.english: Czech Republic is second on 10 points, with Scotland on eight.
sentences.chinese: 捷克累積10分緊隨其後，而蘇格蘭則排名第八。

sentences.english: This score is the acculmulated authority of a content item's source.
sentences.chinese: 這個得分是通過消息源所獲得的權威累積起來的。

sentences.english: The river basins cascade hydropower development may cause the cumulative effects on ecology and environment.
sentences.chinese: 流域的梯級開發對生態環境產生累積效應。

sentences.english: Accumulates the certificate and various aspects certificate has a big pile.
sentences.chinese: 累積下來的獎狀和各方面的證書就有一大堆。
